General.Name: Riyadh Cement Co
General.Description: Riyadh Cement Company engages in the production and sale of cement in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, the Kingdom of Bahrain, Hashemite Kingdom of Jordan, State of Kuwait, and Sultanate of Oman. It offers white and grey cement. The company was formerly known as Saudi White Cement Company and changed its name to Riyadh Cement Company in February 2021. The company was incorporated in 1997 and is based in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
General.Address: Imam Saud bin Abdulaziz bin Mohammed Rd, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, 11494

AddressData.Street: Imam Saud bin Abdulaziz bin Mohammed Rd
